overview: Foreign, Foreign Action & Adventure, Mexico, Spanish Language, Foreign Regions, Foreign Languages - Tough-guy Aurelio (Miguel Angel Rodriguez) takes matters into his own hands when he learns that a member of a prominent family has been kidnapped, making it his job to reunite victim and family. Not surprisingly, this act doesn't sit well with the baddies. Cheated of their ransom, they hatch a plot to get revenge. Nonstop action follows as Aurelio uses every trick in the book to evade his pursuers in this hectically paced thriller.
title: Asesino del Bajio
